title: Shiny New Railway
itunes:title: Shiny New Railway
description:
The Elizabeth line opens in London to fanfare, but Liberal Democrat MP Sarah Olney says there should be money for infrastructure in The North as well as the capital. On the economy, she tells Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker there is now a reasonable expectation of recession. Plus our interviews with the Transport for London Commissioner Andy Byford and Centre for London CEO Nick Bowes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
